lines.text: Incidentally, if you happen to smell something out of the ordinary, don't be alarmed. It's only fresh air.

[as Goofy, head stuck inside a boot, is hanging from a cliff]
Skiing is quite simple once you get the hang of it.
[Goofy leapt from a ski jump, goes flying through the air and ultimately crashes through a window and lands his own bed, fast asleep]
After a vigorous day in the open, the skier never has any trouble falling to sleep.
[Goofy is seen demonstrating this and zooms down the hill at a high speed]
